meanings.definition: A distilled alcoholic beverage made from sugarcane or molasses.
meanings.sent1: The party was lively with the aroma of rums in the air.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed sipping on different rums from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The rums at the bar whispered stories of distant lands.
meanings.sent4: His laughter flowed like rums, warming everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the rums lingered on her tongue long after the party ended.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'rum', referring to multiple instances of the beverage.
meanings.sent1: They sampled various rums at the tasting event.
meanings.sent2: The shelves were stocked with different rums from various countries.
meanings.sent3: The rums on the table chatted excitedly about their origins.
meanings.sent4: The rums lined up on the shelf like soldiers ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: The bartender recommended trying the rums in a flight to compare flavors.

meanings.definition: A slang term for gossip or rumors.
meanings.sent1: The rums about the celebrity spread quickly through the town.
meanings.sent2: She didn't pay attention to the rums about her personal life.
meanings.sent3: The rums at the office were more entertaining than any TV show.
meanings.sent4: The rums swirled around the school like a tornado of secrets.
meanings.sent5: He knew the rums were just stories, but they still made him curious.
